body_html: Instead of using a file reader, the example could use a placeholder in the graph instead of the file reader. Then, pass the bytes of the image into the session.run call as a feed to that placeholder. Those bytes can be obtained directly from available APIs (file loading or memmapping), or through the tensorflow API Env::Default).

Those bytes can be obtained directly from available APIs (file loading or memmapping), or through the tensorflow API Env::Default).
body: Instead of using a file reader, the example could use a placeholder in the graph instead of the file reader.  Then, pass the bytes of the image into the session.run call as a feed to that placeholder.   Those bytes can be obtained directly from available APIs (file loading or memmapping), or through the tensorflow API Env::Default).
